Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
application.util.SoundManager
public class SoundManager extends Object
Centralized sound and music manager for the game.

Uses JavaFX AudioClip for short SFX (PCM WAV) and MediaPlayer for background music (MP3).

Features:

  • SFX caching: AudioClip instances are cached for instant replay.
  • BGM management: Only one BGM track plays at a time; loops indefinitely.
  • Volume control: Separate volume for SFX and BGM.
  • Singleton pattern: One shared instance via getInstance().

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SoundManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton SoundManager instance, creating it if necessary.
      Returns:
      the shared SoundManager

    • playSfx

      public void playSfx(String path, double volumeMultiplier)
      Plays a sound effect with a volume multiplier applied on top of the global SFX volume. Useful for balancing individual clips.
      Parameters:
      path - the resource path (e.g., "/sounds/sfx_line_clear.wav")
      volumeMultiplier - per-clip volume scale (0.0–1.0)

    • playBgm

      public void playBgm(String path, double volumeMultiplier)
      Plays background music with a per-track volume multiplier applied on top of the global BGM volume slider.
      Parameters:
      path - the resource path
      volumeMultiplier - per-track volume (0.0–1.0)

    • stopBgm

      public void stopBgm()
      Stops the currently playing background music.

    • getSfxVolume

      public double getSfxVolume()
      Returns the current SFX volume level.
      Returns:
      the SFX volume (0.0 to 1.0)

    • setSfxVolume

      public void setSfxVolume(double sfxVolume)
      Sets the SFX volume, clamped to the range 0.0–1.0.
      Parameters:
      sfxVolume - the desired SFX volume

    • getBgmVolume

      public double getBgmVolume()
      Returns the current BGM volume level.
      Returns:
      the BGM volume (0.0 to 1.0)

    • setBgmVolume

      public void setBgmVolume(double bgmVolume)
      Sets the BGM volume, clamped to the range 0.0–1.0. Updates the currently playing BGM track immediately.
      Parameters:
      bgmVolume - the desired BGM volume

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Stops all sounds and clears caches. Call on application exit.
